markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Murderer's Knot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2987)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 266 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 66 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You damage an [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creature with a Strike using the affixed weapon.

 
</row>

</column>

---

This black strand of leather is tied to look like a peace knot when the weapon is worn, but it doesn't hamper drawing the weapon. When you activate the knot, the creature you damaged takes 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) until the bleed ends. If you have the [Twist the Knife](/Feats.aspx?ID=570) feat, the talisman instead deals persistent bleed damage equal to your sneak attack damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Murderer's Knot
